description: This Blue colored Daihatsu Terios  2007  is a fantastic deal at just Rs.3675000. It comes with a Automatic transmission system and has 140000km on the clock. This is a bargain you can't afford to miss so get in touch today.This is one of the best suvs in town interms of performance.Company maintained.Economical 12-14km per litre in the city and 15+ out station.Auto gear.Four wheel function can be used if necessary.Excellent ground clearence  ideal for rural and urban road conditions.All new tyres including the spare wheel.ABS,Winker mirror,Central lock and safety auto locking system,arm rest(imported from italy),Heater functions. Upgraded air conditioning system.Selling due to an upgrade.Slightly negotiable for a genuine buyer after inspection.
name: Daihatsu Terios  2007
